post.body: This whole article 13 thing is driving me crazy, and not only that - the german gov. also wants to block access to the Darknet, calling all Tor-users criminals.. *sigh*
Update on Article 13 (EU copyright directive): final text approved today, 16 to 9 votes out of 25. Final voting in March decides the future of this directive..

comment.body: @SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: Yes, only one person - but being a part of the same leading political party which also wants to push Article 13 into existence, there is a big threath that his request to make the usage of Tor a criminal activity might also become reality, just like the copyright directive..
The final vote in Parliament will take place during the 25-28 March II plenary session (TBC)
